name: Secrétaire
description: Secrétaire; René Dubois (French, 1737 - 1799, master 1755); Paris, France; about 1775; Veneered with kingwood, tulipwood, and lemonwood, incised with colored mastic, set with studs of mother of pearl; gilt bronze mounts; 160 x 70.2 x 33.7 cm (63 x 27 5/8 x 13 1/4 in.); 72.DA.60; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Secrétaire
medium: Veneered with kingwood, tulipwood, and lemonwood, incised with colored mastic, set with studs of mother of pearl; gilt bronze mounts
